mousePressed

public void mousePressed(int button,
                         int x,
                         int y)
Event on pressing the mouse Checks, if the click position intersects with one of the roads, if yes, place a vehicle on it. (The method checks, whether this can be done since the vehicles cannot be placed on junctions)
